23 #pragma once
24 
25 namespace cinder { namespace audio {
26 
27 template<typename T>
28 class CircularBuffer {
29  public:
30  typedef std::pair<T*,uint32_t> ArrayRange;
31 
32  CircularBuffer( uint32_t size );
33  ~CircularBuffer();
34 
35  void insert( const T* src, uint32_t size );
36 
37  ArrayRange arrayOne() const {
38  return ArrayRange( mBufferStart, ( mBufferStart >= mBufferLast && mSize == mMaxSize ) ? ( mBufferEnd - mBufferStart ) : mSize );
39  }
40  ArrayRange arrayTwo() const {
41  uint32_t size = ( mBufferStart >= mBufferLast && mSize == mMaxSize ) ? ( mBufferLast - mBuffer ) : 0;
42  return ArrayRange( mBufferLast - size, size );
43  }
44 
45  uint32_t size() const { return mSize; }
46  uint32_t maxSize() const { return mMaxSize; }
47 
48  private:
49  T * mBuffer;
50  T * mBufferLast;
51  T * mBufferStart;
52  T * mBufferEnd;
53 
54  uint32_t mMaxSize;
55  uint32_t mSize;
56 
57 };
58 
59 template<typename T>
60 CircularBuffer<T>::CircularBuffer( uint32_t size )
61  : mMaxSize( size ), mSize( 0 )
62 {
63  mBuffer = new T[mMaxSize];
64  mBufferEnd = mBuffer + mMaxSize;
65  mBufferStart = mBuffer;
66  mBufferLast = mBuffer;
67 
68 }
69 
70 template<typename T>
71 CircularBuffer<T>::~CircularBuffer()
72 {
73  delete [] mBuffer;
74 }
75 
76 template<typename T>
77 void CircularBuffer<T>::insert( const T* src, uint32_t size )
78 {
79  if( size > mMaxSize ) {
80  throw; //TODO
81  }
82 
83  //TODO: size adjustments can probably be better handled with a modulous
84  if( ( mBufferLast + size ) > mBufferEnd ) {
85  uint32_t copySize = mBufferEnd - mBufferLast;
86  memcpy( mBufferLast, src, sizeof(T) * copySize );
87  mBufferLast = mBuffer;
88  if( mSize < mMaxSize ) {
89  mSize = mMaxSize;
90  }
91  src = src + copySize;
92  copySize = size - copySize;
93  memcpy( mBufferLast, src, sizeof(T) * copySize );
94  mBufferLast += copySize;
95  mBufferStart = mBufferLast;
96  } else {
97  memcpy( mBufferLast, src, sizeof(T) * size );
98  mBufferLast += size;
99  if( mSize < mMaxSize ) {
100  mSize += size;
101  } else {
102  mBufferStart = mBufferLast;
103  if( mBufferStart == mBufferEnd ) {
104  mBufferStart = mBuffer;
105  }
106  }
107  }
108 }
109 
110 
111 }} //namespace
